channel.title: How do i change this

item.title: How do i change this
item.dc:creator: @bobbymoore64 bobbymoore64
item.description:
@bobbymoore64 wrote:

[code]public void hitDummy()
{
if (FightType == 1) // attack

		addSkillXP(2500, 0);
		addSkillXP(1500, 3);
                    addSkillXP(5000, 13);
		//sendMessage("You hit the dummy!");
	if (FightType == 2) // strength
	{
		addSkillXP(2500, 0);
		addSkillXP(1500, 3);
                    addSkillXP(5000, 13);
		//sendMessage("You hit the dummy!");
	}
	if (FightType == 3) // defence
	{
		addSkillXP(2500, 0);
		addSkillXP(1500, 3);
                    addSkillXP(5000, 13);
		//sendMessage("You hit the dummy!");
	}
	if (FightType == 4) // controlled
	{
		addSkillXP(1000, 0);
		addSkillXP(1500, 0);
		addSkillXP(1500, 0);
		addSkillXP(1500, 3);
                    addSkillXP(2500, 13);
		//sendMessage("You hit the dummy!");
	}
	if (FightType == 5) // Accurate
	{
                    addSkillXP(5000, 06);
		//sendMessage("You hit the dummy!");[/code][b]

try this i will work (if dont use diffent source)

NOTE:MAKE SURE YOU COMPILE!!! THEN RUN.SERVER THEN PLAY IT SHOULD WORK

bobby,[/b]

item.title: How do i change this
item.dc:creator: @kilopy kilopy
item.description:
@kilopy wrote:

I duno why but my server wont let me change my Attack xp given from a dummy can somone help please this is my code:

[code]public void hitDummy()
{
if (FightType == 1) // attack

		addSkillXP(25, 0);
		addSkillXP(15, 3);
                    addSkillXP(50, 13);
		//sendMessage("You hit the dummy!");
	if (FightType == 2) // strength
	{
		addSkillXP(25, 0);
		addSkillXP(15, 3);
                    addSkillXP(50, 13);
		//sendMessage("You hit the dummy!");
	}
	if (FightType == 3) // defence
	{
		addSkillXP(25, 0);
		addSkillXP(15, 3);
                    addSkillXP(50, 13);
		//sendMessage("You hit the dummy!");
	}
	if (FightType == 4) // controlled
	{
		addSkillXP(10, 0);
		addSkillXP(15, 0);
		addSkillXP(15, 0);
		addSkillXP(15, 3);
                    addSkillXP(25, 13);
		//sendMessage("You hit the dummy!");
	}
	if (FightType == 5) // Accurate
	{
                    addSkillXP(50, 06);
		//sendMessage("You hit the dummy!");[/code]
